column4: Can you help me with some audio issues? I have all updates on hardy done and pulseaudio configured
but no sound whatsoever. No errors just no sound playing on my laptop. Can you help me?
hard to say mate. Did you check alsamixer that the card isn't muted?
yes I did nothing is muted. I would really appreciate any help you can lend me
pronoy , if you type sudo lspci .. what type of card does it report ?
HD Audio Controller?
yeah, probably.
I tried just about every how-to and troubleshooting guide I could find
do this, and paste me the output: lspci | grep -i "audio device"
00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801I (ICH9 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
hm, strange. Should work by default. Um.. you see the volume controller up by the clock ?
double click it.
are any of the devices muted or lowered in volume ?
no both are on maximum
they are both locked, does that mean anything? (sorry noob)
both? Under "Device" in that window .. what does it say? HDA Intel (Alsa mixer) ?
yes that's exactly what it says
ok, try this: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=940689
I can't edit the /boot/grub/menu.lst I get an error message
you need to do "sudo nano /etc ..."
normal users don't have write access to the bootmenu
Hi, still no luck
followed the site, still no luck any other suggestions you have?
